Song.title: Silent Night
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Franz Gruber Public domain

Arrangement.description: 3 Verses, End with chorus of "O Come Let Us Adore Him"
Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [A]Silent night, holy night, [E]All is calm, [A]all is bright, [D]Round yon virgin, [A]mother and child; [D]Holy Infant so [A]tender and mild, [E]Sleep in heavenly [A]peace, [A]sleep in [E]heavenly [A]peace.
Verse 2: [A]Silent night, holy night, [E]Shepherds quake [A]at the sight, [D]Glories stream from [A]heaven afar, [D]Heavenly hosts sing: "[A]Alleluia, [E]Christ the Savior is [A]born! [A]Christ the [E]Savior is [A]born.
Verse 3: [A]Silent night, holy night, [E]Son of God, [A]love's pure light; [D]Radiant beams from [A]Thy holy face, [D]With the dawn of re[A]deeming grace; [E]Jesus, Lord at Thy [A]birth,{,} [A]Jesus, [E]Lord at Thy [A]birth.
{key:E} Chorus: O [A]come, [E]let [A]us [E]a[A]dore Him, O [A]come, [E]let [A]us [D]a[A]dore [E]Him, O [Bm]come, [A/C#]let [D]us [B]a[E]dore [A D]Him, [A]Chri[E]st, the [A]Lord.
